response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This extraordinary item holds immense value and relevance to you, just like it does to us. We understand its significance and are eager to share its benefits with you. To make this acquisition possible, we propose a price of $950,000. This offer reflects our commitment to making high-quality products accessible while maintaining fair business practices. We believe this price not only represents a fair transaction but also provides you with a significant savings compared to its market value. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer or discuss further details.", "product_price": 950000}
